title: Price ceiling causes 6 billion gallon gas shortage

content.question: In the market depicted in the diagram above, if the government imposes a price ceiling of $1.00 per gallon on gasoline, which of the following will result?

choices.label: Neither a surplus nor a shortage, because the price ceiling would not be effective

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets
